ees ambailipitiya, ees mathara ha agreko yana samagam thunata ayath mega wot 180ka pamana dharithawayak ema wasaredi milata gena atha. 2016 wasaredi aarambha kala mema athuru ha hadisi miladi ganim dan wana wita samanya miladi ganim bawata pariwarthanaya kara ganimata widulibala amathyanshaya katayuthu kara thibima puduma sahagathaya. 2018 wasaredi mega wot 170ka widuliya hadisi kramayata miladi ganimata widulibala amathyanshaya piyawara gena thibuni.

adhikarana saha buddha shasana amathiwaraya washayen wijedasa rajapaksha galagodaaththe gnyanasara samanga ekata sita prawruththi sakachcha pawathwima haraha ema bhikshuwa thawa thawath jathiwadi saha aagamika anthayan wetha thallu kirimata padaka wu ayurinma, dan wijedasa rajapaksha ‘hiru’ nalikawe prakashayak kirimath samagama ‘bauddha thorathuru kendraye’ ek bhikshun wahanse namak, ‘jathiwadaya saha aagamika anthawadaya eparu eparu eparu’ namathi ‘lankadipa’ danwimata erehiwa polis mulasthanayata eeye paminili kalaha.
